website_summaries.verdict: A high-definition, low profile, professional fishing camera that attaches to your lure. It’s the perfect camera for capturing the big catch.
pros: Very solid battery life with roughly four hours per charge
Night recording is a huge plus and the built-in LED yellow light won’t scare nearby fish
The hydraulic design allows the camera to move naturally above the lure through the water
The camera is small enough to fit in a tackle box or in pockets
cons: More suited for small fish as the part of the body that connects to the lure may not hold up to the strike of more powerful aquatic or marine life
The camera is difficult to control while underwater

customer_reviews.title: It is the best fishing camera I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fishing lover and I used a lot fishing cameras. The price performance ratio of this one is much higher than others. The main advantages are as followings: 1) Good waterproof performance resistant to cold temperatures 2) Durable camera with high quality videos 3) LED light applied to help with capture clear videos in dark water area 4) Highly adept at capturing footage without spooking fish because of its cute fish-shape. A tip: I find out it will have a highest quality video when I place the hook 5 to 20 inches away from the camera lens:) The product is so fantastic and perfect. I cannot wait to share this with all of my friends and families.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Hills

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two, Neither worked.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these and had the same issue with both. Only video clips that I stop manually can be read by my computer. If you use this device normally the video clips are cut off every 3 minutes. The clips that the camera stops automatically at the end of three minutes are not viewable. Only the clips that you manually stop by pressing the button can be viewed. Since you have to unscrew the back and expose the inside to press this button, it's just not practical. I have tried it in potplayer and VLC along with several other less known video players and I have updated codecs. It could have been very cool but for this major issue.
customer_reviews.author: JeffT

customer_reviews.title: Camera lost due to included hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Great little entry level underwater camera. However, the included snap swivel completely failed on me. It opened up during a cast and I watched my new camera fly away into the ocean. They definitely should include a heavier duty snap swivel with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty well. The quality isn't spectacular
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well. The quality isn't spectacular, but nothing to complain about at this price point. Haven't had any problem with water intrusion, and I've fished as deep as 45 feet so far. My one complaint is that swivels they provide. They claim to be rated to 100lbs, but I wouldn't trust them to that.
customer_reviews.author: LED Fan

customer_reviews.title: Only for small fish
customer_reviews.text: looks like it will work, but not for what I'm after. The ends of the camera ,where you are meant to attach your swivels, is plastic and does not look strong at all. I was hoping to use this to troll for tuna and wahoo, but its not worth losing a lure. Guarantee the ends will break off on the first strike. This is more suited for bass and small fish. Planning to make a wire leader as a safety line between my 2 swivels so I can at least use it one time, after that it will be broken 100% Also it only allows you to record 3 minutes at a time, which is not long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool Camera
customer_reviews.text: First i was a little skeptic about this camera and its low price. But then I hooked up my first barracuda and saw the footage and must say I am pretty impressed by the quality of this little camera.. The only thing is that I have to find a way, that the line in front of the camera doesn't spoil the view. Other than that: 100%
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ouwerkerk

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift.
customer_reviews.text: I love how this sonar/fishfinder camera. Just be careful not to "drop" it in the water from the high above (just gently place it in the water) as it can bob down beneath the ice if the ice depth is not very deep. I hope this product will last and I hope to update my review once I get a change to use it in the summer. Good lucky!
customer_reviews.author: Joom J

customer_reviews.title: I can see under the water
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this camera. It works pretty well and it's cool. I can see under the water.
customer_reviews.author: CPT Dropshot

customer_reviews.title: Swap out the swivel snaps for locking ones.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the water camera was great. Needs weight at the bottom to self level. The swivel snaps that come with it are complete garbage. I didnt like the look of them out of the box and wish I had changed them out before I used it... that was a fifty dollar cast (micro sd card gone also). I'm going to order another one and try it again!!
customer_reviews.author: tim parker

customer_reviews.title: Poor video range
customer_reviews.text: A decent little camera but it is not very stable when used to video trolling and the video suffers from the instability. I ran it off of a planer and the video range is very short. Anything further than 2 ft from the camer is indiscernible. Overall, not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: No buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not lose your money, it's not easy to use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for trolling
customer_reviews.text: I use the camera for trolling in a local lake. Learned quite a bit already about the kokanee behavior from the videos captured.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: First time we put it down into the water it leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hodson

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed! Used it for the first time in 40 feet of water. Thing leaked and failed and didn’t save any of the videos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband really likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for himself, and has used it a few times so far. He really likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Beal Denney

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed——unable to view the video even with suggestions from the company—-always get invalid file format
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: pros and cons... but fish on
customer_reviews.text: I tried this out at a local lake. Pros, you get great quality video and can learn from it. Video is contingent on water quality. Make sure you read reviews... putting a lube or silicon grease on o'rings is a must to avoid water leakage. Cons, you can not control which way the camera is pointed which results in 90% of them containing nothing and you have to view countless hours of footage. Once you have a strike, the camera will point toward the fish (see video).
customer_reviews.author: SocialDragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly as i thought
customer_reviews.text: A+ fast delivery But its a pain in the butt not being able to see it directly from your phone, you put it in water record and then go home hook it up to your computer and watch what you filmed...ahhh to much work for me to do, next time will spend a little more the the one that you can actually see it through your phone while fishing.....thanx anyway :)
customer_reviews.author: cool

customer_reviews.title: Worked in saltwater with a crab snare
customer_reviews.text: Was having trouble catching any crab and remembered I had this camera. I attached it, cast it out, and later viewed the video. It was obvious that the surf I was casting into was too rough for the snare to stay still. Held up to both being cast with a snare (holding a whopping 7oz of sinkers!) and very rough surf. Combined with the price I'd say I'm pretty happy with this gizmo.
customer_reviews.author: BadMonkey0001

customer_reviews.title: Look at other options before settling on this unit.
customer_reviews.text: Check these out before your final decision unless you have to have a inline camera, be forewarned that the Olympus focuses on objects up to 1m and films in B&W only.
customer_reviews.author: BeerFisher

customer_reviews.title: Its was just awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome works great ice fishing. Great portable fish finder camera!! Fish finder exactly as expected. Perfect for interior camping. Very lightweight. Was totally satisfied using this for ice fishing. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: There is a watermark on the video!
customer_reviews.text: There is a watermark on every video that cannot be removed. If I had known this, I would not have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: sam765

customer_reviews.title: Clear water
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it much yet heavier than normal rains for September and my area is murky but it does work video above water is clear but my only under footage has reflected the water conditions but it all was as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: kaoskode

customer_reviews.title: Confusing to know how to format the MicroSD card. I have tried and need to call for help.
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to know when to and how to format the microSD card and know the limits of the cards to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tronic

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic piece of equipment. This is my first time using a fish camera and I am hooked! Not only do I get to enjoy catching fish but I can also capture the beautiful underwater scenery. The quality of the camera is great and is working as intended. Now I have another thing to look forward to on my fishing trips.
customer_reviews.author: William He

customer_reviews.title: Excited!
customer_reviews.text: Received last week and cannt wait to try it in the bayou near our house. After one-hour shooting, I got bunches of gorgeous underwater videos! It is so excited to know what is happening beneath our kayak!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for that fisherman!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a fisherman friend of mine, so I have no first-hand input on this, but my friend loved it and can't wait to try it out! Love the concept and hope it works well for him!
customer_reviews.author: Debi E.

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish and it broke a 32gb card which is not cheap why does Amazon sell crap
customer_reviews.author: m r franklin

product_meta.title: Olymbros Underwater Fishing Camera Professional Waterproof Video Recorder/Rechargeable Battery/Cycle Recording/Support TF Card/Portable HD Video Camera for Ice,Lake and Boat Fishing
feature_bullets: 【Perfect for Carp Predator and Sea Fisherman】- Use the D1 Fishing Camera to capture underwater video (records in HD 1280 X 720) while casting, trolling and bottom fishing in lakes, rivers, and sea. D1 has an AVI cycle recording (3 minutes) function, which can catch each follow, strike, and hit by underwater lives.
【Highly waterproof + Rechargeable Battery】- D1 can be used up to 20m (~65ft) depth and a built-in 1360mA polymer battery contributes to an up to 4-hour video recording time.
【Light Weight Design】 -The hydrodynamic design and lightweight (88g/3.1oz) of D1, balances both stability and floating features underwater.

【Night Recording and Expandable Memory】- A built-in yellow LED light（won't scared fish） at one end of D1 is applied for fill-in illumination in dark environments, which allows users to shoot videos at nights. TF/Micro SD card up to 32G provides enough space for a couple of hours videos.

【Compact Portable Unit】- It fits pockets or buckle box easily, applying for a fishing at a dock, on a boat, or even on the ice. Using D1 Fishing Camera to explore the subsea and see underwater landscape whenever and wherever, making your fishing more funny and enjoyable.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars67 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
